a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: These symbols are definitely something for me. Based on them, I definitely know who is the mastermind of the concert.

a1.speaker: Raiko:
a1.dialogue: I'm back, Jane. Oh, it's not her but a maid I suppose. Anyway, nice to meet you.

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: A redhead with a sleek look? You must be the same person I met in an incident involving my knives behaving weirdly!

a3.speaker: Sakuya:
a3.dialogue: Did you remember when I had really good fun just trolling with you?

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: And once both of us are done, we are like 'let's just chill out after playing rough with each other!'

a5.speaker: Raiko:
a5.dialogue: I haven't done such things yet. It is my late adoptive father who doesn't want anyone to lay a finger on me.

a6.speaker: Raiko:
a6.dialogue: Even if I really deserve it for some unholy reason...

a7.speaker: Raiko:
a7.dialogue: As a result, I stay away from fights, and don't even think of picking up a fight myself.

a8.speaker: Raiko:
a8.dialogue: But as he is long dead and I have risen to power, I am now the apex of House Horikawa.

a9.speaker: Raiko:
a9.dialogue: Commoners like you are supposed to fall on your knees upon seeing me.

a10.speaker: Raiko:
a10.dialogue: I am the one whose voice can make the Welkin Palace tremble.

a11.speaker: Sakuya:
a11.dialogue: You want me to fall on my knees upon seeing you in plain sight?

a12.speaker: Sakuya:
a12.dialogue: Even if you're a noblewoman like what you are claiming, there's a greater chance that you will get duped.

a13.speaker: Sakuya:
a13.dialogue: I have heard about this before.

a14.speaker: Sakuya:
a14.dialogue: It's probably the boyfriend who went off to study for priesthood as one last revenge for your family's corruption.

a15.speaker: Sakuya:
a15.dialogue: They can't produce children meaning no heirs, they go awol on media regulation, and God knows what else.

a16.speaker: Raiko:
a16.dialogue: Are you spilling the beans in the worst bits of our family? This is definitely something that will not go unpunished.

a17.speaker: Raiko:
a17.dialogue: I'm not a lawyer so we cannot kill you as punishment. But something worse is definitely going to happen...

a18.speaker: Sakuya:
a18.dialogue: If you plan to kill me, this is the Inquisition all over again.

a19.speaker: Sakuya:
a19.dialogue: If you won't, I will take back my words and pretend this didn't happen. You'll spare me in the process, right?

a20.speaker: Raiko:
a20.dialogue: What a smart move you're trying to pull in order to get out of this sticky situation. But it's too late now.

a21.speaker: Raiko:
a21.dialogue: Everything you do has their consequences, being connected to each other like a zipper.

a22.speaker: Raiko:
a22.dialogue: When they stay put, everything works as intended, but once unzipped chaos will ensue by what the Almighty wants.

a23.speaker: Raiko:
a23.dialogue: Now, prepare to stand before the Angel of Thunder. You will be engulfed by the chaos that you will heap!

a24.speaker: Raiko:
a24.dialogue: This zipper of fate, once unzipped, shall unleash the Egyptian darkness that befalls those who are holier than you!
